title: Prepare Return with HSA Contributions
description: A taxpayer made contributions to a Health Savings Account (HSA) and wants to claim the deduction.

tasks.description: Gather information on the taxpayer's HSA contributions from Form 5498-SA and W-2.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all relevant HSA data.

tasks.description: Verify that the total contributions do not exceed the annual limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the contributions are within the legal limits.

tasks.description: Prepare Form 8889 to report the HSA activity and calculate the deduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the HSA deduction.
